AI Description: Bracken is a tool that utilizes a Bayesian framework to estimate species abundance from metagenomic data generated by sequencing. It is particularly useful in the analysis of microbial communities and microbiome data.
Core Features: Estimates Species Abundance From Metagenomic Data, Utilizes A Bayesian Framework, Useful For Analyzing Microbial Communities & Microbiome Data
General Tags: Metagenomics, Microbiome, Species Abundance Estimation, Bayesian Analysis
